start_with_us: Start your journey of recitation, memorization, and learning now!
about_us_desc: We are the first electronic educational platform specializing in teaching, memorizing, and studying Quranic curricula, Islamic sciences, and educational methods remotely in a fun and engaging way!
subscription_saved_go_to_checkout: Subscription saved successfully, please proceed to payment
password_pattern: Password must include uppercase, lowercase, number, and symbol
home_page_header_title: Learn the Quran and its sciences easily with the best instructors
home_page_header_subtitle: The Baraa platform connects you with Quran and Islamic sciences teachers through an affordable subscription to enhance your knowledge effortlessly
about_desc: The Baraa platform is your ideal destination for learning the Quran and Islamic sciences. It offers you a unique educational experience with specialized instructors guiding you step by step in each subject, whether it’s texts, Tajweed, memorization, or Islamic sciences. Our platform is distinguished by flexibility in scheduling lessons, along with subscription plans tailored to your needs.
our_vision_desc: Our vision at Baraa Academy is to empower students to achieve personalized learning by giving them the freedom to choose the subjects that suit their needs, the teaching style that matches their preferences, the educational system that enhances their abilities, and the instructor who shares their vision to achieve their academic and religious goals.
select_your_fav_instructor_desc: Browse the list of specialized instructors and choose the most suitable one based on their profile.
select_your_fav_materials: Select the materials you want to learn
select_your_fav_materials_desc: Specify the subjects you wish to study, such as Quran, Tajweed, memorization, or Islamic sciences, to personalize your learning experience.
your_subscription_has_been_approved: Your subscription has been approved by the platform
data_bot_complete_mesage: Some data is incomplete, such as the phone number in the profile. Please go to complete it.
please_copy_this_message_and_send: Please copy this message and send it by clicking on one of the available applications.
phone_verfication_has_been_requested: The phone verification request has been sent and will be approved as soon as possible. Please ensure that the request was sent via WhatsApp or Messenger. To confirm again, please click the following button.

policy.change_teacher_desc: The student has the right to change the teacher at any time after subscription. Al-Baraa platform reserves the right to change the teacher assigned to the student at any time in case of emergency circumstances or changes in the teacher's schedule (such as illness, travel, work commitments, or other reasons beyond our control). This change is implemented to ensure: Continuity of the educational process without interruption, Maintaining the level of service and efficiency, Immediate notification of the student or guardian of the change, The new teacher is at the same level as the previous teacher. This step aims to ensure that the student does not stop memorizing or studying and to provide a stable and continuous educational experience.
policy.fixed_schedules_desc: The schedules are chosen by the student according to their convenience, and the schedule can be changed by submitting an excuse request or at the end of the subscription. Sessions are non-refundable, cannot be postponed to another month, and subscription fees cannot be refunded.
policy.session_count_desc: You have a set number of sessions distributed over your scheduled appointments. When your sessions are completed according to your schedule, it means you have completed your sessions (i.e., the subscription is not monthly but based on sessions).
policy.teacher_selection_desc: The appropriate teacher and teaching method are chosen through recorded sessions of teachers.
policy.education_system_desc: The educational system, curriculum, teaching method, and review systems are not fixed by the platform but vary from one teacher to another. You can check the teacher's system and his method of managing the session through their profile and recorded sessions.
policy.session_system_desc: The sessions are conducted individually (privately) and are not in the form of group courses or group sessions. Therefore, the teacher ensures that the student masters every part thoroughly. The duration of completing the Quran memorization, Tajweed, or any other subject depends on the student's comprehension ability and progress. After that, it depends on the session timing and number of sessions.
policy.customer_service_desc: The most important feature of the Al-Bara platform is its top-level customer service team available 24/7 to follow up on students, protect their rights with teachers, ensure their time is respected, and provide the best environment for student progress.

PAYMENT_POLICY.PREPAYMENT_DESC: Students must pay the subscription fee in advance to book monthly sessions. Payment can be made using Visa cards, international bank transfers, or any other available payment method. If using an external payment method, the student must contact customer service to confirm the payment and activate the subscription.
PAYMENT_POLICY.SUBSCRIPTION_VALIDITY_DESC: The monthly subscription is valid for one month from the activation date. The number of available sessions is determined according to different packages. Unused sessions cannot be carried over to the next month except in specific exceptional cases (such as illness with proof).
PAYMENT_POLICY.RENEWAL_DESC: Subscriptions are not automatically renewed. When the subscription ends, the student must subscribe again and make a new payment. Reminder notifications are sent to the student before the subscription expires to prompt renewal.

CANCELLATION.SUBSCRIPTION_CANCELLATION_DESC: Students can cancel their subscription before the start of the new month, preventing renewal. If canceled after the month has started, they are not entitled to a refund but can continue using the remaining sessions until the subscription ends.
CANCELLATION.REFUNDS_BEFORE: Before the month starts: A full refund is available if cancellation occurs before the subscription begins.
REFUNDS_CONDITIONS: Subscription fees are non-refundable unless in emergencies (such as chronic illness or force majeure), with supporting documents.
If the instructor is unavailable for scheduled sessions and no suitable alternative is provided, the student has the right to request a refund for the remaining amount or use it for future sessions.
CANCELLATION.SESSION_CANCELLATION_DESC: Students must notify the instructor X hours before the scheduled session time; otherwise, the session will be considered used. If the instructor cancels a scheduled session, the student is entitled to an additional session or a refund.
CANCELLATION.STUDENT_LATE_DESC: If the student is late, lost time will not be compensated. If the student does not attend without prior notice, the session is considered used and non-refundable.
CANCELLATION.INSTRUCTOR_LATE_DESC: If the instructor is late, they must compensate for the lost time or schedule a makeup session.

policy_privacy.information_collection_text: We collect some personal information upon registration, such as name, email, phone number, and learning preferences, to provide a personalized learning experience.
policy_privacy.information_usage_text: We use the collected information for purposes such as account management, enhancing learning experiences, improving our services, and communicating updates.
policy_privacy.data_protection_text: We implement security measures to protect user data from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction.
policy_privacy.data_sharing_text: We do not sell or rent user data. However, we may share information with teachers, legal authorities if required, and service providers under privacy agreements.
policy_privacy.cookies_text: We use cookies to enhance the user experience, store preferences, and provide personalized content. Users can disable cookies in their browser settings.
policy_privacy.user_rights_text: Users have the right to access, modify, delete their personal data, or object to certain processing methods.
policy_privacy.policy_changes_text: We may update the privacy policy from time to time. Users will be notified of significant changes via email or platform notifications.
policy_privacy.contact_us_text: For any inquiries regarding our privacy policy, please contact us via email or our 24/7 customer support.

payment_issue_message: If the amount has been withdrawn from your account or wallet, please don't worry. Just contact support via WhatsApp and we will solve the problem quickly and easily.
